character.name: Riggs?
desc: Your pilot? Her cards are mostly <c=boldPink>card draw</c> and <c=boldPink>chaotic movement</c>, alongside <c=boldPink>missiles</c> and <c=boldPink>sequential actions</c>.

EvilRiggsRageStatus.name: Rage
EvilRiggsRageStatus.desc: When this status reaches <c=boldPink>7</c> or higher, set it to 0 and add a Missile Swarm to your hand.

Sequential.name: Sequential
Sequential.desc: Triggers the top set of actions when first played this turn, and the bottom set of actions on all subsequent plays this turn.

ADroneRandomMove.title: Midrow Move Random
ADroneRandomMove.desc: Instantly move all <c=midrow>midrow objects</c> <c=boldPink>{{cnt}}</c> spaces in a random direction.

BuriedKnowledge.name: BURIED KNOWLEDGE
BuriedKnowledge.desc: At the start of combat, add 3 <c=card>Ponder</c>s to the discard pile.

Lexicon.name: LEXICON
Lexicon.desc: Whenever you gain a <c=card>Ponder</c> during combat, it is given the A or B upgrade, alternating.

Normal.name: Light Missile
Normal.description: This missile is going to deal <c=damage>1</c> DMG.
